## isTeam() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Check whether a given value is an [ITeam](./types.iteam.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isTeam(arg: any): arg is ITeam;
```

**Returns:**

arg is [ITeam](./types.iteam.md)

## Example

Here's an example of how to use this guard

```ts
const team = { id: 'li', name: 'LinkedIn' };
isTeam(team); // true
```
